experienceList: Developed 3D object scene-positioning and download logic for a prototype VR Boutique E-commerce application using C#, Firebase and Unity.
Worked on a mitigation technique proposal for a Session Fixation vulnerability for a client’s platform.
Designed and developed a HTTP Mocking Framework for E2E tests applicable to all network related features, resulting in a development speed boost that benefits 29 million users.
Modernized app codebase by replacing Factory pattern with Dependency Injection of network client invocations.
Documented and exposed the project to employee community with a population of 71,970.
Created a note organizing android app to scan and classify handwritten texts by topic.
Used cloud-based machine learning services for optical character recognition and text topic classification with 560 categories.
Provided external processing and storage using Firebase APIs to ensure compatibility with 625 million client devices.
Created a 3D image processing node to detect specific game items. Project won 2nd place at Conexión Tec Expo in the software category.
Developed a machine learning model for object localization, achieved an R2 of 96%.
Wrote computer vision routines for geometry-based target acquisition system.
Authored main control program with teleoperation and autonomous modes, contributing to the Rookie All Stars awarded to our team among 43 other teams in Monterrey Regional 2019.
Led software development in a team of 5 programmers and a total of 45 team members.
Wrote a vision-based target acquisition system using closed-control loops and 2 computing systems.
Added inverse kinematics to follow 4 different trajectories across the game field.
